output: An office worker stands determined in tailored blazer and pencil-sharp glasses, features that convey focus and professionalism. The mid-morning natural light from wide-open windows highlights their structured shoulders while diffusing shadows. The clean, modern open-plan office with polished flooring exemplifies a space of productivity and positivity, evoking feelings of efficiency and success.
